name: Essential Classy Addons For Elementor | EC Addons
author: KAP ASIAs

sections.description:
🔥 Supercharge your Elementor Page Builder with Highly customizable Elementor, Essential Classy Addons For Elementor | EC Addons and 100+ widgets to build websites in less time. Both Elementor and Essential Classy Addons For Elementor plugins take your Elementor WordPress website experiance to the next level. The best part is that you can design anything without having coding knowledge.

Comes with 100+ Widgets & Extensions Elementor addons . Take your WordPress website to the next level. Most widgets are Free and the Pro Version offers even more widgets and functionality.

🧱 Check Elementor Widgets & Addons Official Site

🧱 Try Testing Environment

🧱 Ready Made Template

🧱 EDITOR PANEL NOT LOADING

ℹ️ Useful Links

Support | Video Tutorials | Facebook Group

The widget demos below combine both pro and free features.

Complete Features Explained Under Few Mins Watch Now

Totally Customizable

Each element comes with a lots of options to customize your site in each and every possible way. You can achieve any design with your creativity in Elementor Website Builder.

Light Weight & fast Loading

No extra resources or unused codes to slow down your site. We follows the coding standards of Elementor Website Builder and WordPress.

Widgets/Elements Control option

Enable/Disable individual widgets/elements to make your page loading faster and smoother.

100+ widgets

🔥 Supercharge your site with Essential Classy Addons For Elementor Comes with 100+ widgets to take your Eleemntor WordPress site to next level.

Expert Support

We have extra-ordinary support team ready to help you. A Professional team at your door to help you with all your querys.

FULLY RESPONSIVE & CROSS BROWSER READY

Each widget and addon has been tested on different screen sizes, mobile devices, and tablets keeping in mind to add special responsive controls for the widgets and addons we create.

🧱 100+ Elementor Widgets & Addons Included and COUNTING

Info Unfold Card – Show 3 more card on click with unfolding effects.

Creative Title – Divide the Title and Shows Additional Text with Effcets.

Info 3d Card – 3d Card Design. Info 3d Grid Cards, Info 3d Slider Cards

Info Profile Elementor – Creative with Effcet. Info Profile Elementor, Info Profile Slider Elementor

Creative Gallery – 25 types of Patterns and Custom Clip Path options with FancyBox.

Flipbox – 4 Predefined Direction. Flipbox Grid Listing, Flipbox Slider Listing

Team Member – 8 Design and 4 type of Hover Animation. Team Member Grid Listing, Team Member Slider Listing

Testimonial – 9 Design with Grid and slider. Testimonial Grid Listing, Testimonial Slider Listing

Design Grid Layout – Follow the Rules of Design with Grid.

Slide Anything – Slide Anything allows you to create a carousel/slider where the template for each slide can be anything you want to your website using Essential Classy Addons For Elementor | EC Addons.

Slide Post Listing –
Transform Your Posts or Custom Posts displays with advanced slider layouts in Elementor.

Slide Custom Listing – Shows the list of slides like info lists wih slider.

Grid Post Listing Templete – Show post or cpt design using custom template.

Slide Post Listing Template – Made creative post design as per your site branding in Elementor.

Draw SVG – Draw SVG widget make attention of visitor on your website.

Grid Custom Listing – Custom Listing in Grid.

Particles Effects – Cool particle Effect on backgrounds to any page or post.

Layer Image – Add multiple images in as per your position in one place.

Circle Menu – Circle menu come with 10+ Direction.

Creative Button – Quickly add modern buttons with hover effects with predefine 50+ style.

Mail Chimp – Allows you to add newsletter sign-up form.

WordPress Site Logo Title Tagline – The Site Widget lets you add a logo or image representing, Title and Tagline your website identity and help increase brand identity WordPress website using EC Addons and Elementor Page Builder.

Copyright – Ensure that your New Year’s list includes year updates automatically.

Blog Builder – Essential Classy Addons For Elementor is a user friendly Elementor based addon plugin for creating beautiful blog posts, post listing, post slider and post carousel within a few seconds and Collection of Blog Widgets like. Post Title, Post Meta, Post Content, Post Image, Post Author Info, Post Comment and Post Navigation. Create your own design to display your blog posts using Essential Classy Addons. Title,Meta,Content,Image,Author Info,Comment,Navigation.

Advanced Steps Process – Advanced Steps Process With Vertical & Horizontal Layout, Custom Pin Option, 3 type of Effects in Elementor widget of Essential Classy Addons for Elementor.

Creative Blockquote – Creative Blockquote 20+ Predefne layout.

Device Mockup – Comes with 6 Predefine Mockup, Custom Mockup Option in Elementor.

Pricing Menu – Comes with 3 type of layout.

Pricing Table – Unique Pricing table widget come with 10+ Ribbon option.

Background Color change on Scroll – Change backgrounds color of Section / Container automatically on Scroll in Elementor.

Background Image change on Scroll – Change backgrounds image of Section / Container automatically on Scroll in Elementor.

Dynamic News Ticker – Flexible and user friendly news ticker.

Calendly Meeting Scheduler – Easy and simple way to embedding Calendly scheduling widget on Elementor page WordPress.

Freebusy Meeting Scheduler – Create seamless scheduling experiences using Freebusy in Elementor.

Accordion – The best responsive and drag & drop Accordion FAQ Widget with a lot of customization options. Advanced Accordion Widget helps to display text and template in a amazing way and in a cool stylish design in Elementor.

Advanced Text Block – Advanced Text Block that shows Awesome Text in your website. Advanced text editor widget which contain H1 – H6, anchor and span tag to show your text in creative way in Eleemntor.

Back to Top – Back to Top widget allows the visitor to easily scroll back to the top of the page.

Business Hours Opening closing hours – Elementor Business Hours Widget on a website to display opening hours for your customers. You can manage with Day wise or custom you want in Elementor.

Button – A simple and powerful widget that adds a Button to your website. Button gives you an amazing way to create unique call to action button. Also it has Dual Button option.Add Dual buttons side by side.Custom Icon/Text can be placed in the middle of the buttons.

Changelog One by One – Changelog manager for digital products or releasable products. The widget allows you to create a nice and clear custom list with One by One Animation.

Advanced Chart – Represent your data such as lines, bars, radar, pie. doughnut, polararea or bubble charts.

Dark Mode Styling – Great way to create a stunning dark version of your page/ website.

Dropcap – Nice and easy interface to your paragraph with Dropcap. First letter of the text as a Drop Cap with 3 different layout. You can set as a watermark text as background.

Grid Post Listing – Grid Post Listing widget allows you to create grid, list, filter. Post Grid Plugin is Easy to use in Eleemntor. Grid Post Listing is the perfect solution for blog based websites.

Image Hover Effect – Image Hover Effect for Elementor comes with 25+ styles that add hover effects to your images with customization option with social links.

Info Box – Design beautiful info box from 3 predefined styles. Display information using the info box widget of the EC Addons for Elementor. Infobox Grid Listing, Infobox Slider Listing

Lottie – Lottie animations are open source, lightweight and available for free. Elementor addon to use creative layout to your site with smaller json file using Lottie animations. 5+ animation options. Scroll based animation. JSON Based Animation. Autoplay; On Hover, On Click, Mouse Over-Out Effect, Scroll Based, Inline and more and easy to use and light weight widget in Elementor.
check demos Reverse animation on second click, Play on Hover, Click with Delay, On Scroll Parallax, Iconinc, Mouse Over Out Animation Play, Body on Scroll

Lottie on Scroll – Lottie animated on scroll based.

Marketing Link – Easily make pretty links to show on button comes with 5+ predefined layout.

Scroll Progress – Sticks to top, bottom, Left and Right. Reading Progress Bar is a best way to encourage your visitors to scroll through the whole page and continue reading your content.

Social Icons – Social Icons Widget helps adding icons with links to social media profiles on your website. Create amazing social media icons and setup links. It have tons of social icon customization to use in WordPress using Elementor.

Title – Easy-to-use Title widget for Elementor Addons with 10+ layout and easy to customize in Elementor.

Tabs – Horizontal or vertical tabs with click or hover.

Image Sequence Scroll – Create stunning image sequence animations that are controlled with mouse or touch.

Countdown – Shows intractive timer for your comming soon, Under construction or product expire time.

Hover Background – On mouse intract change background image and view content with effect. Also Manage Icon/Image, Title, Content and Button.

Image Accordion – Responsive and Touch enabled image accordion for Elementor WordPress Website comes with Vertical and Horizontal layout with Animation.

Service Lists – List your information in service list manner.

Text background – Normal text to any creative texture using gif or any animated image.

Whatsapp – Integrate WhatsApp Chat Button experience directly into your Elementor WordPress website.

WooCommerce Cart – Adds a beautiful WooCommerce Cart page to boost online sales & modify design in Elementor.

WooCommerce Checkout – Adds a beautiful and Build attractive WooCommerce Checkout pages & modify design in Elementor.

WooCommerce Order Track – Adds a beautiful and Nice way to track your woocommerce order & modify design in Elementor.

WooCommerce MyAccount – Adds a beautiful and Manage your all purchased info from woocommerce MyAccount & modify design in Elementor.

Woo Widgets Collection – Collection of customizable elements specifically for WooCommerce, allowing you to effortlessly integrate product grids, sliders, carousels, and more into your site’s design. With intuitive controls and seamless integration with WooCommerce, this widget empowers you to showcase your products beautifully and effectively, driving engagement and boosting sales.
Title,Short Description,Product Description,Product Image,Product Grid/Slider Gallery,Badge,Rating,Price,Stock,Sold Info,Attribute,Add to Cart,Info Tabs,Navigation and Breadcrumb.

Contact Form 7 – Customize attractive forms with styling option.

Gravity Form – Simple and nice Customization.

WPForms – Customize attractive forms.

🧱 Elementor Extension & Addons Included

One Template manage for All pages using Ec Addons Display Condition.

Display Condition – Manages Section/Container/widget display by conditions. Content visibility based on User Role, Date/Time, URL, Login Status and more…

WooCommerce Display Condition
You can manage content Visibility.

Dynamic Fields Display Condition

Post/Page based Display Condition
You can manage content Visibility using POST/PAGE based in Elementor WordPress.

Equal Height – Easily equalize the height of columns/Widgets.

Advanced Box Shadow – Add multiple box shadows to an element in Elementor.

Advanced Drop Shadow – Add multiple drop shadows.

Advanced Text Shadow – Add multiple text shadows.

Fancy Border – Using eight values specifying border-radius in CSS, you can create attractive and unique look with Fancy Border.

Glassmorphism – Apply a modern glass blur effect to the Elementor section/container/column/widget making it looks great.

Link – Place custom links into sections / container / column or widget on Elementor.

🧱 MISSING FEATURES/BUG IN EC ADDONS?

share with us.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin and activate it
  2. Edit any page/post using edit with elementor option
  3. On elementor widget menu, search/scroll and find the widget
  4. Drag and drop this widget, where you have to add
  5. Customize the options
  6. in a minute you have added the widget, Keep on crafting creative layout using Elementor Page Builder and Essential Classy Addons For Elementor.
sections.faq:
How do I install Essential Classy Addons For Elementor?

To install the Essential Classy Addons For Elementor, follow the steps below:
From your WordPress dashboard -> Go to Plugins -> Click on ‘Add new’ and In the Search field, enter Essential Classy Addons For Elementor.
Press install -> After installation, click Activate.

Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No, You cannot use without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Do I need to know how to code?

No, Elementor Builder and it’s addons provides you with all the widgets and features that you need to build a proffesional website without knowing code structure. Just drag and Drop.

Does it work with all the themes?

Yes, It works with all the themes which follows the coding standards.

Does it work with other WordPress plugins?

Yes, It works with most of the plugins. If you face any issue feel free to contact us we’ll help you. and provide all posible solution.

Can I create an online store?

Yes, with the Elementor, WooCommerce Builder and Essential Classy Addons For Elementor you can customize every page of your store to create an amazing customer experience. Like Cart, Checkout, MyAccount and Order Track pages.

Editor fails to load or not working?

Please take a look https://kapasias.com/ultimate-troubleshooting-of-common-issues-of-elementor-page-builder/

sections.reviews:
Boosting Creativity with Dynamic Data Integration

By romlim on January 4, 2024

I recently had the pleasure of testing ECaddons, and I must say it exceeded my expectations. The abundance of widgets and extensions provided by this plugin is truly impressive, adding a generous dose of creativity to Elementor. What sets ECaddons apart is its seamless integration with dynamic data sources like ACF, Pods, and WCK, allowing for a more personalized and dynamic website experience. I also couldn't help but notice the inclusion of widgets for headers and blog elements, making me suspect that a Theme Builder might be in the works. If you're looking to take your Elementor experience to the next level, ECaddons is definitely worth checking out!

Great plugin with amazing support

By Worda Themes (wordathemes) on March 16, 2023

recommended

Great plugin

By Wayne (waynep16) on March 16, 2023

Works as expected and developer was able to introduce some new functionality for us to help the plugin!
